org.gravitechx.frc2018.utils

Class TalonSRXFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gravitechx.frc2018.utils.TalonSRXFactory

  • public class TalonSRXFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs Talon objects using various configurations. In most cases it uses a TalonConfig.
    See Also:
    WPI_TalonSRX, SpeedController, TalonConfig
